trans-unit.source: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 实现基数据传输机制。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口，其方法提供的数据传输格式无关机制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is typically used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> and in drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>通常用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>和在拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class provides the recommended implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类提供的建议的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口。

trans-unit.source: It is suggested that you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class rather than implementing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> yourself.
trans-unit.target: 建议你使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，而不是实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>自己。

trans-unit.source: Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 多个不同格式的数据可以存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Data is retrieved from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> by its associated format.
trans-unit.target: 从检索数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>由其关联的格式。

trans-unit.source: Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> in multiple formats.
trans-unit.target: 因为目标应用程序可能未知，你可以提高的数据将以正确的格式为应用程序通过将中的数据的可能性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>以多种格式。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>对预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过创建的实例实现您自己的格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>类。

trans-unit.source: To store data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>, pass the data to the constructor or call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，将数据传递给构造函数或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can add data in multiple formats to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将数据多种格式添加到同一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%29> with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望数据则添加要在其本机格式，这仅调用检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%29>与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Data can be retrieved from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> in any format which is compatible with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以从检索数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>与兼容的任何格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, text can be converted to Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，文本可以转换为 Unicode。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A> with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索已存储的格式中的数据，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: To determine what formats the data is stored in, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的数据存储在何种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To determine if a format is available, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> with the desired format.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定一种格式是否可用，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>与所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类提供了其他方法，使得更轻松地处理数据通用格式。

trans-unit.source: To add data of a particular format to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>, use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加到特定格式的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，使用适当`Set`*格式*方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data of a particular format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>) to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>) to retrieve the data if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> contains it.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的从某一特定格式的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，首先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>) 以确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含数据以的格式，然后调用相应`Get`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>) 来检索数据，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含它。

trans-unit.source: Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特殊的注意事项。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 由于在当前实现中的限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>有关序列化的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标应用程序需要一种非常具体的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序不能识别你的数据。

trans-unit.source: To preserve your data format, add your data as a <xref:System.Byte> array to a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and pass the <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留数据格式，请添加你的数据作为<xref:System.Byte>数组到<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>并将传递<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将中的数据添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is created and a component is stored in it.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>创建和组件存储在其中。

trans-unit.source: Then, it checks to see if data in the appropriate type exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它会检查以查看相应的类型中的数据是否存在于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: The result is displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: The next example retrieves the data stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例检索中存储的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is created with text data.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>创建了文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，检索数据时，将其格式指定为字符串，并显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: The data format is automatically converted from text to string.
trans-unit.target: 数据格式自动从文本转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>并向其中添加数据。

trans-unit.source: The example then retrieves and displays the data.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检索并显示数据。

trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> class and adds the specified object to it.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 类的新实例，并为其添加指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add data in any format to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> when you use this constructor, or you can add data as an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> to provide multiple formats at once.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将数据添加到任何格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>时使用此构造函数，也可以添加数据作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>提供多种格式一次。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with COM programming, you can also add a data object that implements the COM `IDataObject` interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 COM 编程，你还可以添加数据对象实现 COM`IDataObject`接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see `IDataObject` in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅`IDataObject`在 MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，其中包含一个字符串。

trans-unit.target: 使用数据的格式来检索的数据。

trans-unit.target: 结果将显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: The data to store.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 类的新实例，并以指定格式为其添加指定的对象。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类使用一个字符串，指定为字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: The data is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> by specifying its format as text.
trans-unit.target: 从检索的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>通过指定其格式为文本。

trans-unit.source: The results are displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 结果将显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data object contains audio data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据对象包含音频数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the data object contains audio data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定此数据对象是否包含音频数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> 格式的数据，或者是否包含可以转换为该格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data object contains a file drop list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据对象包含文件放置列表则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 文件下拉列表是一个包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the data object contains a file drop list before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFileDropList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定数据对象是否包含文件下拉列表中检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFileDropList%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> 格式的数据，或者是否包含可以转换为该格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data object contains image data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据对象包含图像数据则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the data object contains image data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定此数据对象是否包含检索之前图像数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains text data.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data object contains text data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据对象包含文本数据则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the data object contains text data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定此数据对象是否包含文本数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data object contains text data in the format indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据对象是否包含由指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值表示的格式的文本数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data object contains text data in the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据对象包含指定格式的文本数据则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the data object contains text data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定此数据对象是否包含文本数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an audio stream from the data object.
trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中的音频流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing audio data or <see langword="null" /> if the data object does not contain any data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 包含音频数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />；如果此数据对象不包含任何 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 格式的数据，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains audio data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含使用此方法进行检索之前音频数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetAudio%2A> method to add audio data to the data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetAudio%2A>方法将音频数据添加到数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与所指定数据格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与所指定数据格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>有关的有效数据的格式存储在此列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: When `format` is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower.
trans-unit.target: 当`format`是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the data stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is created with text data.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>创建了文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，检索数据时，将其格式指定为字符串，并显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified class type format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与所指定类类型格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>有关的有效数据的格式存储在此列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the data stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is created with a component.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>创建的组件。

trans-unit.source: Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its type.
trans-unit.target: 然后，检索的数据，指定其类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the retrieved data is displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中显示的检索到的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to the convert data to the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将数据转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified data format, using an automated conversion parameter to determine whether to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与所指定数据格式关联的数据，使用自动转换参数来确定是否将数据转换为此格式。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>有关的有效数据的格式存储在此列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: When `format` is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower.
trans-unit.target: 当`format`是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the data stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>, using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether to convert the data format.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，使用`autoConvert`参数来指定是否将转换的数据格式。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is created with text data.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>创建了文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Then the example tries to retrieve the data, specifying its format as a string and no format conversion, that is, the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 然后此示例尝试检索数据，将其格式指定为字符串而不进行格式转换，即`autoConvert`参数是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This operation fails because there is no string data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 此操作会失败，因为中的没有字符串数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Next, the example tries to retrieve the data again, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，此示例尝试再次，检索数据与`autoConvert`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This operation succeeds and the results are displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此操作成功，结果显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联。

trans-unit.source: The format to check for.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联，或是否可以转换成指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据与指定的格式关联，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine whether a format exists before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可确定格式是否存在，然后再调<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for the formats that are available in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>的格式，可在此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: If no data can be retrieved, no exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以检索不到任何数据，则会不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Instead, `false` will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 相反，`false`将返回。

trans-unit.source: Then the examples prints whether text data exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.

trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联，或是否可以转换成指定的格式。

trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据与指定的格式关联，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether data of the specified type exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>, or whether the data can be converted to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例确定中是否存在指定类型的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>，或是否可以为指定的类型转换数据。

trans-unit.source: The result is displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: The code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: The format to check for.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to determine whether data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> can be converted to the specified format; <see langword="false" /> to check whether the data is in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see langword="true" /> 时，确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中存储的数据是否可以转换成指定的格式；值为 <see langword="false" /> 时，检查数据的格式是否为指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> contains data in the specified format or, optionally, contains data that can be converted to the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 是否包含指定格式的数据，或者是否包含可以转换为指定格式的数据，后者可选。

trans-unit.target: 如果数据采用指定的格式，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`时：

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and the data is in a format that can be converted to the appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`true`的数据也可以转换为适当的格式的格式。

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and the data is in the appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`false`和该数据会在适当的格式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` when:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`时：

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, and it cannot convert data to the specified format, or the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中, 查找数据和它不能将数据转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and data does not exist in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`false`，数据不存在于此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>中指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 是否允许进行转换的存储指定和请求的格式是否与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: If no data can be retrieved, no exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以检索不到任何数据，则会不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Instead, `false` will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 相反，`false`将返回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether data currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is associated with a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例确定是否数据当前存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>程序与指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: First, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is initialized with a string, specifying its format as text.
trans-unit.target: 首先，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>初始化替换字符串，指定其格式为文本。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is queried for data associated with the text format, specifying the `autoConvert` parameter as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>查询文本格式，与关联的数据指定`autoConvert`参数作为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The result of this query is printed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 此查询的结果将打印在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is queried for data associated with string format, specifying the `autoConvert` parameter as `true`.
trans-unit.target: 则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>查询字符串格式，与关联的数据指定`autoConvert`参数作为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The results are printed in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中输出的结果。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of file names from the data object.
trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中文件名的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing file names or <see langword="null" /> if the data object does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 为包含文件名的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，如果此数据对象不包含任何 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> 格式的数据，或者不包含任何可以转换为该格式的数据，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 文件下拉列表是一个包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is stored in a data object as a <xref:System.String> array.
trans-unit.target: 文件放置列表存储在数据对象作为<xref:System.String>数组。

trans-unit.source: This method converts this array to a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection> and returns the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将此数组转换<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection>并返回该集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsFileDropList%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains a file drop list before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsFileDropList%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含使用此方法进行检索之前文件下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetFileDropList%2A> method to add a file drop list to the data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetFileDropList%2A>方法将文件放置列表添加到数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with or can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中的数据所关联的或可以转换为的所有格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with or can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中的数据所关联的或可以转换为的所有格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.String" />, containing a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的数组，它包含所有格式的列表，并且这些格式受存储在此对象中的数据支持。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>对预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 是否允许进行转换的存储指定和请求的格式是否与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example queries a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> for the formats associated with its data, and the formats that the data can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例查询<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>其数据与关联的格式和数据可以转换为的格式。

trans-unit.source: The resulting list is displayed in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中显示生成的列表。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retrieve all formats that data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with, or can be converted to; <see langword="false" /> to retrieve only native data formats.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see langword="true" /> 时，检索存储在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中的数据所关联的或可以转换成的所有格式；值为 <see langword="false" /> 时，仅检索本机数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> is associated with or can be converted to, using an automatic conversion parameter to determine whether to retrieve only native data formats or all formats that the data can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 中的数据所关联的或可以转换为的所有格式的列表，同时使用自动转换参数来确定是只检索本机数据格式，还是检索此数据可以转换为的所有格式。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.String" />, containing a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的数组，它包含所有格式的列表，并且这些格式受存储在此对象中的数据支持。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>对预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 是否允许进行转换的存储指定和请求的格式是否与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example queries a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> for the formats associated with its data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例查询<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>于其数据与关联的格式。

trans-unit.source: The first query specifies the `autoConvert` parameter as `false`, so only the native format of the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: 第一个查询指定`autoConvert`参数作为`false`，因此，仅返回的数据的本机格式。

trans-unit.source: The second query specifies the `autoConvert` parameter as `true`, so the list of formats includes the formats that the data can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 第二个查询指定`autoConvert`参数作为`true`，因此格式的列表包括数据可以转换为的格式。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an image from the data object.
trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> representing the image data in the data object or <see langword="null" /> if the data object does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 为表示此数据对象中图像数据的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，如果此数据对象不包含任何 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> 格式的数据，或者不包含任何可转换为该格式的数据，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsImage%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains image data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsImage%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含使用此方法进行检索之前图像数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetImage%2A> method to add image data to the data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetImage%2A>方法将图像数据添加到数据对象。

trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中的文本数据。

trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的文本数据。

trans-unit.source: The text data in the data object or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the data object does not contain data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 为此数据对象中的文本数据，如果此数据对象不包含 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 格式的数据，则为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains text data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否使用此方法进行检索之前包含文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A> method to add text data to the data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>方法将文本数据添加到数据对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves text data from the data object in the format indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 检索此数据对象中由指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值表示的格式的文本数据。

trans-unit.source: The text data in the data object or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the data object does not contain data in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为此数据对象中的文本数据，如果此数据对象不包含指定格式的数据，则为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains text data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否使用此方法进行检索之前包含文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A> method to add text data to the data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>方法将文本数据添加到数据对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adds data to the data object in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 将数据以 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 格式添加到此数据对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 包含音频数据的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array to the data object in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format after converting it to a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 在将 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组转换为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 之后，将其以 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 格式添加到此数据对象。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve audio data from the data object, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains audio data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索此数据对象中的音频数据，请先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含音频数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="audioBytes" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="audioBytes" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 包含音频数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to the data object in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 以 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 格式添加到此数据对象。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve audio data from the data object, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A> method to determine whether the data object contains audio data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索此数据对象中的音频数据，请先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含音频数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetAudioStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用对象类型作为数据格式将指定对象添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.Object%29> overload stores the `data` value in a format that it determines by calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.Object%29>重载存储`data`中一种格式，它确定通过调用值<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If `data` implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface, this overload also stores the value in the <xref:System.Windows.DataFormats.Serializable> format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`data`实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口，此重载还存储中的值<xref:System.Windows.DataFormats.Serializable>格式。

trans-unit.target: 若要检索此数据对象中的文本数据，请先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含检索之前图像数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, target device, aspect, and medium that will be used for future notifications.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构，它定义以后的通知将使用的格式、目标设备、方面和介质。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF" /> values that specifies a group of flags for controlling the advisory connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF" /> 值，它指定用于控制通知连接的一组标志。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink" /> interface on the advisory sink that will receive the change notification.
trans-unit.target: 指向将接收更改通知的通知接收器上的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink" /> 接口的指针。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a DWORD token that identifies this connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含指向标识此连接的 DWORD 标记的指针。

trans-unit.source: You can use this token later to delete the advisory connection by passing it to <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.DUnadvise(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 以后可以使用此标记来删除通知连接，方法是将该标记发送至 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.DUnadvise(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: If this value is zero, the connection was not established.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为零，则未建立连接。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, medium, and target device that the caller would like to use to retrieve data in a subsequent call such as <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的、指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构的指针，该结构定义调用方在后续调用（如 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />）中检索数据时将要使用的格式、介质和目标设备。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> member is not significant in this case and should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> 成员并无意义，应将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure that contains the most general information possible for a specific rendering, making it canonically equivalent to <c>formatetIn</c>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，结果包含指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构的指针（该结构中包含可能用于特定呈现的最常规信息），使其规范地等效于 <c>formatetIn</c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller must allocate this structure and the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetCanonicalFormatEtc(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@)" /> method must fill in the data.
trans-unit.target: 调用方必须分配此结构，并且 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetCanonicalFormatEtc(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@)" /> 方法必须填充数据。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data in a subsequent call such as <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />, the caller uses the supplied value of <c>formatOut</c>, unless the value supplied is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 为了在后续调用（如 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />）中检索数据，调用方将使用提供的 <c>formatOut</c> 值，除非提供的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This value is <see langword="null" /> if the method returns <see langword="DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法返回 <see langword="null" />，则此值为 <see langword="DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> member is not significant in this case and should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> 成员并无意义，应将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Provides a standard <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure that is logically equivalent to a more complex structure.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个在逻辑上与更复杂的结构等效的标准 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether two different <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structures would return the same data, removing the need for duplicate rendering.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以确定两个不同的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构是否将返回相同的数据，从而无需重复呈现。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, medium, and target device to use when passing the data.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的、指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构的指针，该结构定义传递数据时将使用的格式、介质和目标设备。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify more than one medium by using the Boolean OR operator, allowing the method to choose the best medium among those specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔型 OR 运算符可以指定多个介质，从而允许方法在指定的介质中做出最佳选择。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> structure that indicates the storage medium containing the returned data through its <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.tymed" /> member, and the responsibility for releasing the medium through the value of its <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> member.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含一个指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> 结构的指针，该结构通过其 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.tymed" /> 成员指示包含返回数据的存储介质，并通过其 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> 成员的值指示释放介质的责任。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> is <see langword="null" />, the receiver of the medium is responsible for releasing it; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> points to the <see langword="IUnknown" /> interface on the appropriate object so its <see langword="Release" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则介质接收方负责释放介质；否则，<see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> 指向相应对象上的 <see langword="IUnknown" /> 接口，以便调用其 <see langword="Release" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The medium must be allocated and filled in by <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 介质必须由 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 进行分配和填充。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Obtains data from a source data object.
trans-unit.target: 从源数据对象中获取数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> method, which is called by a data consumer, renders the data described in the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure and transfers it through the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 数据使用者调用的 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 方法将呈现指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构中描述的数据，并通过指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> 结构传输该数据。

trans-unit.source: The caller then assumes responsibility for releasing the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 然后，调用方对释放 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> 结构的责任进行假定。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, medium, and target device to use when passing the data.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的、指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构的指针，该结构定义传递数据时将使用的格式、介质和目标设备。

trans-unit.source: Only one medium can be specified in <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" />, and only the following <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> values are valid: <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_ISTORAGE" />, <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_ISTREAM" />, <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_HGLOBAL" />, or <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_FILE" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> 中只能指定一个介质，并且只有下列 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED" /> 值有效：<see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_ISTORAGE" />、<see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_ISTREAM" />、<see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_HGLOBAL" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.TYMED.TYMED_FILE" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" />, passed by reference, that defines the storage medium containing the data being transferred.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" />，它定义包含正在传输的数据的存储介质。

trans-unit.source: The medium must be allocated by the caller and filled in by <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetDataHere(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 介质必须由调用方分配并由 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetDataHere(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 填充。

trans-unit.source: The caller must also free the medium.
trans-unit.target: 调用方还必须释放介质。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method must always supply a value of <see langword="null" /> for the <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> member of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> structure that this parameter points to.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现必须始终为此参数指向的 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease" /> 结构的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> 成员提供一个 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Obtains data from a source data object.
trans-unit.target: 从源数据对象中获取数据。

trans-unit.source: This method, which is called by a data consumer, differs from the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> method in that the caller must allocate and free the specified storage medium.
trans-unit.target: 数据使用者调用的此方法与 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 方法的区别在于调用方必须分配并释放指定的存储介质。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, medium, and target device to use for the query.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的、指向 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构的指针，该结构定义要用于查询的格式、介质和目标设备。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the data object is capable of rendering the data described in the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 确定数据对象是否能够呈现 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构中所描述的数据。

trans-unit.source: Objects attempting a paste or drop operation can call this method before calling <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> to get an indication of whether the operation may be successful.
trans-unit.target: 尝试执行粘贴或删除操作的对象可以在调用 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 来获取操作是否成功的指示之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值，以及下面的值：

trans-unit.target: </term><description> 对 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)" /> 的后续调用可能会成功。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the format used by the data object when interpreting the data contained in the storage medium.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC" /> 结构，该结构定义数据对象在解释存储介质中包含的数据时所使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> structure, passed by reference, that defines the storage medium in which the data is being passed.
trans-unit.target: 由引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM" /> 结构，该结构定义其中正在传递数据的存储介质。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the data object called, which implements <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.SetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@,System.Boolean)" />, owns the storage medium after the call returns.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 指定调用的数据对象，该对象实现 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.SetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@,System.Boolean)" />，并在调用返回后拥有存储介质。

trans-unit.source: This means that the data object must free the medium after it has been used by calling the <see langword="ReleaseStgMedium" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，数据对象在使用介质后，必须调用 <see langword="ReleaseStgMedium" /> 函数来释放该介质。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to specify that the caller retains ownership of the storage medium, and the data object called uses the storage medium for the duration of the call only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则指定调用方保留存储介质的所有权，所调用的数据对象只能在调用期间使用存储介质。

trans-unit.source: Transfers data to the object that implements this method.
trans-unit.target: 将数据传输至实现此方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by an object that contains a data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由包含数据源的对象调用。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support the type of the underlying data object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不支持基础数据对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
